001package org.relationlearn.util;
002
003/**
004 * Enumerator used to describe the possible types of relation between two
005 * ArgumentNode objects in a RelationDigraph.
006 * 
007 * @see org.relationlearn.model.ArgumentRelation
008 * @see org.relationlearn.model.ArgumentNode
009 */
010public enum RelationType {
011    /**
012     * Value representing that the origin ArgumentNode supports the argument
013     * stated by the target ArgumentNode.
014     */
015    SUPPORT, 
016    
017    /**
018     * Value representing that the origin ArgumentNode disapproves the argument
019     * stated by the target ArgumentNode.
020     */
021    ATTACK, 
022    
023    /**
024     * Value representing that the origin ArgumentNode does neither 
025     * support the argument stated by the target ArgumentNode nor disapproves 
026     * it.
027     */
028    UNKNOWN;
029}
